## 2. Data processing

### 2.1. Data loading

```{r dataloading}
library("data.table")

path <- getwd()

fileUrl <- "https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2"

download.file(fileUrl, destfile = paste0(path, 'repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2'), "curl")
unzip(zipfile = "repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2")
storm_d_f <- read.csv(bzfile("repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2") , header = TRUE)
storm_d_t <- as.data.table(storm_d_f)

```
